text: "It's Hard to Be a Saint in the City" is a 1973 song by Bruce Springsteen and is the ninth and final track to his debut studio album Greetings from Ashbury Park, N.J.. It has been covered by David Bowie and remains unreleased as a single. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:David Bowie songs
title: It's Hard to Be a Saint in the City
